channel.title: Can you start a server without a host?
channel.description: ok i want to have a server where people can log on without having to pay for a host. Is it possible to be 24/7 or people to join server without host?

item.title: Can you start a server without a host?
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

Dedicated Server,
You gotta pay like $60 a month.
Or $300 a year

Read full topic
item.source: Can you start a server without a host?

item.title: Can you start a server without a host?
item.dc:creator: @Global_Mod Global Mod
item.description:
@Global_Mod wrote:

Yes, you have to have it hosted. Go to:

no-ip.com

A co-owner or admin for when the server is open to the public.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you start a server without a host?

item.description:
@visiblesound wrote:

guys u r going off-topic idc bout real rs lol. i’m saying i dled a source and edited it, i am capable of logging on my server, but i don’t have a host, are people able to go on my server?

item.title: Can you start a server without a host?
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

[quote=“firewithin3, post:8, topic:251603”][quote author=Bloody4 Ftw link=topic=332139.msg2591935#msg2591935 date=1229818081]
UMM… You cannot start a server without a host. All servers require a host. Even RuneScape runs with a host from a supercomputer. End Of Discussion

MOD LOCK.
[/quote]No it doesn’t, each world on runescape has it’s own dedicated server.[/quote]

all the worlds are all one server dedicated with multiple worlds run by mainframe computer that can make millions of calculations in seconds (8th grade stuff)

mostly there is a design team that spend a lot of time creating ideas and new items or areas and add it to the game, then they compile it and have a reset timer to warn people…

then there is the team that moderate the game and forum

(not that detailed but its pretty basic stuff)

Read full topic
item.source: Can you start a server without a host?

[/quote]No it doesn’t, each world on runescape has it’s own dedicated server.[/quote]

LMFAO FAIL… to be dedicated it has to be hosted some how… and its hosted on a super computer… lmfao u fail bro, dont act all smart cus u not

item.title: Can you start a server without a host?
item.dc:creator: @rune-pure rune-pure
item.description:
@rune-pure wrote:

[quote=“Doom32dd, post:5, topic:251603”]he is asking if he can have a server without hosting it so i AM right

pfft[/quote]

nop wrong… to still have it on you need to leave the server on…

Well just leave your comp on all night… with the server running

Still a better way is to get some one to host it

But you need to have no-ip…

YOU CANT RUN A SERVER WITH OUT HOSTING IT BY YOUR SELF

Read full topic
